title:
Currents in non-equilibrium steady states of open inhomogeneous
  $XX$-spin chains
authors:
Pierre-Antoine Bernard, Isma\"el Bussi\`ere, Roberto Floreanini, Luc
  Vinet
abstract:
We investigate spin and heat currents in the non-equilibrium steady state of
inhomogeneous $XX$-spin chains, which act as interfaces between two bosonic
heat baths. Using special functions that diagonalize the single-particle
Hamiltonian, we derive closed-form expressions for these currents. For small
temperature differences between the baths, we show that inhomogeneities
breaking the mirror symmetry of the chain significantly reduce both heat and
spin conductivities. Connections with perfect state transfer are discussed.
